# Registration

Registration for the Young Statisticians Conference 2017 is now open. 

1. [Click here to submit an abstract](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScb9AN4J6odAa8HleA_fsKJ_vG_Ukn7XMM4Dz_Cv67z0jGjTA/viewform), or you may use the embedded form on this page.
2. [Click here to register to attend YSC2017](https://statsoc.360membershipcrm.com.au/member/eventreg.php?eid=NDQ). 

***

For those of us who are new to this conference thing, everyone who would like to attend must [register]((https://statsoc.360membershipcrm.com.au/member/eventreg.php?eid=NDQ)) for this conference and only those who wish to present a talk or poster need to submit an [abstract](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScb9AN4J6odAa8HleA_fsKJ_vG_Ukn7XMM4Dz_Cv67z0jGjTA/viewform).

***

If you are not a member and would like to be added to the mailing list for this event, please register your details [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScrtwxu4CRayb7iUTjwX7zQJUarav-D2kOXRV-SVX8LTXmJOA/viewform).

***
